data.meanings: to light/kindle a fire, made it burn, provoke mischief, to be blasted, fire/blaze/heat/hell/flame, madness/insanity/possessed/demonic, vehement hunger/thirst.
data.sentence: The word سَعِيرًا comes from the root س ع ر and is associated with the meanings: to light/kindle a fire, made it burn, provoke mischief, to be blasted, fire/blaze/heat/hell/flame, madness/insanity/possessed/demonic, vehement hunger/thirst.

data.meanings: to warm at the fire, endure heat, to roast/fry/broil/burn.
data.sentence: The word وَيَصْلَى comes from the root ص ل ي and is associated with the meanings: to warm at the fire, endure heat, to roast/fry/broil/burn.
